dcterms:description: SUMO is an open source, microscopic and multimodal traffic simulation software that simulates a complex traffic network with vehicles following their defined trips. It is widely used for various traffic simulation experiments.
dcterms:title: SUMO (Simulation Urban Mobility)

dcterms:description: The Jurong Area in Singapore is used as a simulation environment for the EV navigation system, providing a realistic traffic network for testing various reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Jurong Area, Singapore

dcterms:creator: H. Zhang

dcterms:description: CityFlow is a multi-agent reinforcement learning environment designed for large scale city traffic scenarios, facilitating the testing and development of traffic management algorithms.
dcterms:title: CityFlow

dcterms:creator: L. Huang
S. Zhao
R. Luo
R. Su
M. Sindhwani

G. R. Dhinesh
dcterms:description: Traffic simulation software including SUMO, TESS NG, PTV VISSIM, etc., are utilized for simulating traffic scenarios when real-world data is inaccessible.
dcterms:title: Traffic simulation software
